title: 113_hr3989
content: Disaster Savings Accounts Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) establish tax-exempt disaster savings accounts to pay the expenses of homeowners for disaster mitigation and recovery expenses, (2) allow a deduction from gross income up to $5,000 in a taxable year for cash contributions to such accounts, (3) exclude from gross income distributions from such accounts to pay disaster mitigation and recovery expenses, and (4) set forth tax rulesnbsp, and penaltiesnbsp. For excess contributions to disaster savings accounts and for failure to file required reports on such accounts.
